amendment.description: To enact the Disaster Air Quality Monitoring Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2026 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 78 - 17. Record Vote Number: 418.

action.text: Amendment SA 2026 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S13482, S13482-13483; text: CR S13482-13483) To enact the Disaster Air Quality Monitoring Act.
